item.title: Bean Themes
item.description: Have you ever thought about what kind of theme song your character, pet, or fursona might have? Techno, EDM, synthwave, or some rock organ? Maybe you need a retro chiptune for your protogen, or nothing short of a lively tropical jam will do for your parrot. Perhaps there’s a suave fox who needs to get down to some heart-pounding EDM or prowl the neon streets of synthwave city. Either way, your character deserves a great tune to go with all of that exquisite artwork you have.

item.title: Everyone-Games
item.description: Everyone-Games is a Team of Volunteersâ€¦ Promoting accessibility through online events, software solutions, games, social media activism, and working with game developers in the industry. General Info This year, Everyone-Games is partnering with two charities: Everyone Can and Stack Up Donation Campaign Guess what? I’m going to be there! I’ll be streaming Stardew Valley, showing how us blind folk play videogames, and raising money for both charities! Donate to Everyone Can on Tiltify Donate to Stack Up on Tiltify Join in!
